short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Windows to visit them later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension to manage your windows. Use this extension to save your whole window, so that you can open them later.
- Store all the urls in your window in the extension storage (No cluttering of bookmarks)
- Open all the tabs discarded (only for firefox), so that load on system can be reduced.
